alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Rensselaer; Eastern Schenectady; Schoharie; Southern Saratoga; Western Albany; Western Rensselaer; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 2:11PM EST until January 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 inches or less. Ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...The Schoharie Valley, Helderbergs, Capital Region and northern Taconics of eastern New York. * WHEN...Through 1 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute today and the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain, sleet and a little snow will continue into this evening, then transition to spotty light rain and drizzle overnight. Rain and snow showers will persist on Friday. Snow accumulations will be minimal, with up to an inch or two possible Friday morning, especially over higher terrain. Ice accumulations will be a tenth of an inch or less.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Albany; Eastern Rensselaer; Eastern Schenectady; Schoharie; Southern Saratoga; Western Albany; Western Rensselaer; Western Schenectady
